nodes.text: A Munificent-class star frigate served the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Battle of Coruscant in 19 BBY. It engaged Venator-class Star Destroyer 622 over Coruscant, but was destroyed by flak guns commandeered by the Jedi Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi, who had boarded the CIS flagship Invisible Hand. The two Jedi first destroyed the star frigate's bridge, then its midsection, and the engines last.
The Munificent-class star frigate appeared in the video game version of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
